title: Bloomberg Markets: Kemp Says Cyber-Hacks Hurt Stocks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kemp Says Cyber-Hacks Hurt Stocks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tom Kemp CEO Centrify Discussing research that uncovers the extent to which data breaches have become a C-suite level problem.
